info.title: Navigate to the last radio button

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstRadioButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first radio button

user: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the last radio button.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Regular crust' radio button, navigate to the last radio button.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 3, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
